name: eventconnect
description: EventConnect - Plataforma integral para descubrir eventos y conectar con tribus

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:web" "npm run dev:mobile"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:web
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:web && npm run test:mobile
scripts.test:watch: concurrently "npm run test:watch:backend" "npm run test:watch:web" "npm run test:watch:mobile"
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:coverage:backend && npm run test:coverage:web && npm run test:coverage:mobile
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:web && npm run lint:mobile
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:backend && npm run lint:fix:web && npm run lint:fix:mobile
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:web && npm run format:mobile
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check:web && npm run type-check:mobile
scripts.security:audit: npm run security:audit:backend && npm run security:audit:web && npm run security:audit:mobile
scripts.security:fix: npm run security:fix:backend && npm run security:fix:web && npm run security:fix:mobile
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:web && npm run install:mobile
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:web && npm run clean:mobile && npm run clean:root
scripts.clean:backend: cd backend && rm -rf node_modules dist coverage logs
scripts.clean:web: cd web && rm -rf node_modules .next out coverage
scripts.docker:build: npm run docker:build:backend && npm run docker:build:web

author: EventConnect Team
